steps.title: Go to winworldpc.com.
steps.content: Go to winworldpc.com. It is possible to download from other sources but winworldpc is a trusted website which also provide MS-DOS programs. This Site Also provides Old Windows Versions

steps.title: Click MS-DOS in the DOS section.
steps.content: Click MS-DOS in the DOS section.

steps.title: Choose which file you want to download.
steps.content: Choose which file you want to download. The CD-ISO was chosen for this tutorial.

steps.title: Choose a mirror site (any will do) and wait for the download to finish.
steps.content: Choose a mirror site (any will do) and wait for the download to finish. If the download doesn't start, allow your browser to allow websites to know where you've come from.

steps.title: Insert the CD or floppy disk, with MS-DOS 7.1 on it, into your computer and start it.
steps.content: Insert the CD or floppy disk, with MS-DOS 7.1 on it, into your computer and start it.

steps.title: Make sure the 'I agree.'
steps.content: Make sure the 'I agree.' box is checked and click Next .

steps.title: Click Create a FAT32/16/12 Primary Partition.
steps.content: Click Create a FAT32/16/12 Primary Partition .

steps.title: Leave all the disks in their drives and click Reboot now.
steps.content: Leave all the disks in their drives and click Reboot now .

steps.title: Press Enter.
steps.content: Press Enter . The next few steps will look exactly the same as the last few (to a point) but it's vital that you repeat them.

steps.title: Make sure the 'I agree.'
steps.content: Make sure the 'I agree.' box is checked and click Next .

steps.title: Decide where you want MS-DOS 7.1 to install and click Next.
steps.content: Decide where you want MS-DOS 7.1 to install and click Next .

steps.title: Consider installing the add-ons.
steps.content: Consider installing the add-ons. The next few steps are all down to personal preferences but it is recommended that you do install all the add-ons as it makes using MS-DOS easier. 'Full installation' and 'Install Add-Ons' were checked and the Next was clicked.

steps.title: Confirm that the above settings are correct and click OK.
steps.content: Confirm that the above settings are correct and click OK .

steps.title: Click Continue if you wish to install additional add-ons (this was selected in the tutorial).
steps.content: Click Continue if you wish to install additional add-ons (this was selected in the tutorial).

steps.title: Decide whether you want to install drivers for your sound cards (Yes was chosen here).
steps.content: Decide whether you want to install drivers for your sound cards ( Yes was chosen here).

steps.title: Choose your sound card and click Continue.
steps.content: Choose your sound card and click Continue . Sound Blaster AWE Pnp was chosen in this tutorial.

steps.title: Click No.
steps.content: Click No . It will put you in an endless loop if you click Yes .

steps.title: Click Enable both UMB and EMS.
steps.content: Click Enable both UMB and EMS .

steps.title: Ensure all the options are checked and click Continue.
steps.content: Ensure all the options are checked and click Continue .

steps.title: Choose your keyboard and click Continue.
steps.content: Choose your keyboard and click Continue . UK users, check the 850 box.

steps.title: Choose the keyboard layout you would like and click Continue.
steps.content: Choose the keyboard layout you would like and click Continue .

steps.title: Remove the setup disk and click Yes to reboot the computer.
steps.content: Remove the setup disk and click Yes to reboot the computer.

steps.title: The setup is now complete and you can now explore all that MS-DOS 7.1 has to offer.
steps.content: The setup is now complete and you can now explore all that MS-DOS 7.1 has to offer.

steps.title: Make sure the DOS prompt shows only C:
steps.content: Make sure the DOS prompt shows only C: \

steps.title: Type S.
steps.content: Type S . Your computer should now shutdown.

steps.title: To restart the computer, type 'shutdown' then press r or press the following keys Ctrl Alt Delete.
steps.content: To restart the computer, type 'shutdown' then press r or press the following keys Ctrl Alt Delete . Do NOT move the mouse whilst the computer is restarting or it will crash on boot up.

steps.title: To cancel the shutdown/restart process, press c.
steps.content: To cancel the shutdown/restart process, press c .
